channel.title: Daylight Bard Spell List
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Daylight Bard Spell List" - Daylight is not on the Bard spell list.

item.title: Re: Daylight Bard Spell List
item.content:encoded: I double checked against dndbeyond and couldn't find it anywhere. I've removed it from the Bard spell list. If someone else finds the source please post it here and we can add it back to the page.

item.title: Daylight Bard Spell List
item.content:encoded: I cannot find any single source claiming Daylight should be on the Bard's spell list. Is this a mistake, or have I not looked deep enough?
